UniprotID	Q7Z7A3
Accession	Q7Z7A3;A8K558;Q96GZ7
EntryName	CTU1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Cytoplasmic tRNA 2-thiolation protein 1 (EC 2.7.7.-) (ATP-binding domain-containing protein 3) (Cancer-associated gene protein) (Cytoplasmic tRNA adenylyltransferase 1)
GeneName	CTU1 ATPBD3 NCS6
Length	348
Function	Plays a central role in 2-thiolation of mcm(5)S(2)U at tRNA wobble positions of tRNA(Lys), tRNA(Glu) and tRNA(Gln). Directly binds tRNAs and probably acts by catalyzing adenylation of tRNAs, an intermediate required for 2-thiolation. It is unclear whether it acts as a sulfurtransferase that transfers sulfur from thiocarboxylated URM1 onto the uridine of tRNAs at wobble position.
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm
Disorder	0.2034,0.1881,0.2328,0.2129,0.2002,0.1298,0.1611,0.1942,0.2541,0.1881,0.2094,0.2399,0.2193,0.2193,0.1206,0.0506,0.1028,0.1048,0.0543,0.0531,0.0258,0.0258,0.0258,0.0136,0.0184,0.0181,0.0341,0.0223,0.0138,0.0123,0.0205,0.0148,0.0101,0.0087,0.0097,0.0148,0.0168,0.0111,0.0153,0.0327,0.0690,0.1028,0.0870,0.0734,0.1206,0.0719,0.0870,0.0618,0.0929,0.1476,0.1399,0.1349,0.1969,0.2783,0.3215,0.2609,0.1791,0.2258,0.3149,0.2224,0.1251,0.1298,0.1323,0.1206,0.1424,0.2002,0.2680,0.1914,0.2193,0.1449,0.1449,0.0929,0.0967,0.0543,0.0364,0.0281,0.0281,0.0506,0.0704,0.0676,0.0568,0.0929,0.0909,0.0592,0.1007,0.1275,0.0870,0.0704,0.0704,0.0592,0.0851,0.0581,0.0985,0.0929,0.1583,0.1823,0.1823,0.2470,0.1611,0.1611,0.1048,0.2002,0.1349,0.1449,0.1759,0.1251,0.0985,0.0662,0.0909,0.1528,0.1184,0.0749,0.1092,0.1048,0.0618,0.0618,0.0605,0.0780,0.0631,0.0704,0.0518,0.0870,0.0704,0.1229,0.0967,0.1373,0.1881,0.2164,0.3087,0.2918,0.2817,0.3631,0.3840,0.3019,0.3182,0.2951,0.1969,0.2292,0.1671,0.1298,0.1823,0.2094,0.2064,0.1823,0.1115,0.1424,0.1528,0.1528,0.1323,0.1298,0.1298,0.0909,0.0909,0.1229,0.2002,0.1942,0.2094,0.2364,0.2503,0.3087,0.3948,0.4051,0.3774,0.3840,0.4256,0.4766,0.4292,0.4292,0.4409,0.4087,0.3321,0.2988,0.3740,0.2715,0.2258,0.2129,0.2064,0.3053,0.3426,0.3321,0.3321,0.2503,0.2129,0.2399,0.2328,0.2224,0.2575,0.2094,0.1969,0.1852,0.2783,0.3529,0.4017,0.3872,0.4940,0.5493,0.4652,0.4979,0.4864,0.3948,0.3948,0.4256,0.4256,0.4725,0.3667,0.3356,0.3356,0.3494,0.4292,0.4441,0.3872,0.3019,0.2328,0.1449,0.1251,0.1323,0.0888,0.1399,0.1184,0.0780,0.1611,0.1007,0.0463,0.0749,0.0734,0.1449,0.0870,0.0631,0.0334,0.0281,0.0320,0.0494,0.0605,0.0518,0.0909,0.1070,0.1092,0.1611,0.1611,0.1702,0.1731,0.1184,0.1852,0.2783,0.2094,0.2129,0.1791,0.2680,0.3249,0.4441,0.4685,0.4119,0.3426,0.3019,0.4087,0.3392,0.2849,0.2817,0.3087,0.2817,0.2849,0.3529,0.3529,0.3249,0.2575,0.2988,0.3182,0.3149,0.3149,0.3149,0.3149,0.3460,0.3704,0.4582,0.5382,0.4940,0.4507,0.5098,0.5017,0.3872,0.4149,0.3740,0.3053,0.3494,0.3
